name: k6-performance-tests
description: K6 performance testing for Nopcommerce and Pizza applications

scripts.test:final1: k6 run --env SCENARIO=registration_test --env K6_SCENARIO=registration_test final-1-nopcommerce.js && k6 run --env SCENARIO=shopping_test --env K6_SCENARIO=shopping_test final-1-nopcommerce.js
scripts.test:final2: k6 run --env SCENARIO=create_user_test --env K6_SCENARIO=create_user_test final-2-pizza.js && k6 run --env SCENARIO=rate_pizza_test --env K6_SCENARIO=rate_pizza_test final-2-pizza.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:final1 && npm run test:final2
